name: Talisman - An Art Installation
description: This collaboration between Rajni Perera and Yorgo Liapis, blends a retelling of history, a fully charged object and a speculative fiction sculpture. It attempts a rebalancing of energies and a space between binary identities and viewpoints, while at the same time referencing an incident between two cities at the height of Egyptâ€™s empires Luxor (then Thebes) and Amarna.
